title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Blended Research Methodology Workshop for Instructional Designers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic instructional design theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more evaluation criteria for a given instructional design strategy case using qualitative (interviews, observations) and quantitative (surveys, statistical analysis) methods of mixed research methodologies and present analytical results for each criterion in a one-page report.
Develop plans to enhance emotional resilience and ethical decision-making skills required at different career stages.
Analyze real-world science education design cases to propose practical solutions for adapting to changes in work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
